__e: You see, it's been hard on me too, harder than I thought.

Don't let it make you think you're tougher than you are.
I have thicker skin than you can even imagine.
Still. Trust me. The one thing worse than seeing Dad once a year was seeing him all year.

Just being the "it couple"- it's so much harder than I thought.
I never met a person so hard to feed.
But I don't want it to be any harder on him than it has to be.
